response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is truly exceptional. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you might be even greater. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the cost and value I have invested in it but also acknowledges its significance to you. I trust that this proposal will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 1200000}
